scripts.build: tsc && cd e2e-test && skir gen && cd ..
scripts.copy-to-client: cp e2e-test/skir.h client && cp e2e-test/skir.cc client && cp e2e-test/skir.testing.h client
scripts.copy-to-client:check: diff -s e2e-test/skir.h client/skir.h && diff -s e2e-test/skir.cc client/skir.cc && diff -s e2e-test/skir.testing.h client/skir.testing.h
scripts.format: prettier --write "**/*.ts" && npm run format-skir && npm run format-cc
scripts.format:check: prettier --check "**/*.ts" && npm run format-skir:check && npm run format-cc:check
scripts.test-cc: cd e2e-test && cmake -S . -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && cmake --build build && ctest --test-dir build --output-on-failure && cd ..
scripts.build-client: cd client && cmake -S . -B build && cmake --build build && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-cc && npm run build-client
